title: How to Make Striped Iced Cocktails

steps.headline: Get yourself two ice cube trays and two different coloured drink.
Use one ice cube tray for each colour.
steps.description: Pour the drinks to the trays.

steps.headline: Once you've pour the spaces of the ice cube trays, you can put it into the freezer, and wait till the ice cubes to freeze.
And, once they have frozen, take them out and now you're going to put the ice cubes into the freezer bags and use one freezer bag for each colour.
Just tip them in, make sure you get them all out of the ice cube tray.
Now, you are going to crush the ice and the best way to crush it is to use a rolling pin.
steps.description: If you do not want to, you can use the back of the spoon.

steps.headline: It's a bit noisy!
steps.description: An once both bags have been crushed, get yourself a long glass / cocktail glass and now you will need to layer the ice.

steps.headline: So put the first colour first, just put a little bit.
steps.description: And put the other colour just a bit. The first colour then the second colour. Keep going till you've fill the glass.

steps.headline: Now, if you want a bit of a smoothie, you could make a yoghurt iced cocktail.
steps.description: You make exactly the same way but instead of using drink, you use two different flavoured yoghurt. Spoon it into your ice cube trays and then you freeze them. Then you crush them and spoon it to your long glass / cocktail glass. Then you fill it to the top and it look delicious! Good enough to drink.

text: Get yourself two ice cube trays and two different coloured drink.  Use one ice cube tray for each colour. Pour the drinks to the trays. Once you've pour the spaces of the ice cube trays, you can put it into the freezer, and wait till the ice cubes to freeze.  And, once they have frozen, take them out and now you're going to put the ice cubes into the freezer bags and use one freezer bag for each colour.  Just tip them in, make sure you get them all out of the ice cube tray.  Now, you are going to crush the ice and the best way to crush it is to use a rolling pin. If you do not want to, you can use the back of the spoon. It's a bit noisy! An once both bags have been crushed, get yourself a long glass / cocktail glass and now you will need to layer the ice. So put the first colour first, just put a little bit. And put the other colour just a bit. The first colour then the second colour. Keep going till you've fill the glass. Now, if you want a bit of a smoothie, you could make a yoghurt iced cocktail. You make exactly the same way but instead of using drink, you use two different flavoured yoghurt. Spoon it into your ice cube trays and then you freeze them. Then you crush them and spoon it to your long glass / cocktail glass. Then you fill it to the top and it look delicious! Good enough to drink.
